20110126030051.000|20110126030054.000|CC1|PRESSURE THAN AT ANY POINT SINCE

20110126030325.000|20110126030327.000|CC1|FINALLY ABLE TO VOTE FOR

20110126030335.000|20110126030338.000|CC1|PEOPLE DANCED IN THE STREETS.

20110126030911.000|20110126030914.000|CC1|CLASS KID FROM SCRANTON CAN SIT 
20110126030914.000|20110126030918.000|CC1|BEHIND ME.

20110126030930.000|20110126030931.000|CC1|PRESIDE AS SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE 
20110126030931.000|20110126030935.000|CC1|IN THE GREATEST NATION ON EARTH.
20110126030935.000|20110126030951.000|CC1|(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)           
20110126030951.000|20110126030954.000|CC1|THAT DREAM, THAT AMERICAN DREAM 
20110126030954.000|20110126030956.000|CC1|IS WHAT DROVE THE ALLEN BROTHERS
20110126030956.000|20110126030957.000|CC1|TO REINVENT THEIR ROOFING       
20110126030957.000|20110126031000.000|CC1|COMPANY FOR A NEW ERA.          
20110126031000.000|20110126031002.000|CC1|IT'S WHAT DROVE THOSE STUDENTS  
20110126031002.000|20110126031004.000|CC1|AT FORSYTH TECH TO LEARN A NEW  
20110126031004.000|20110126031007.000|CC1|SKILL AND WORK TOWARDS THE      
20110126031007.000|20110126031008.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110126031008.000|20110126031011.000|CC1|AND THAT DREAM IS THE STORY OF A
20110126031011.000|20110126031014.000|CC1|SMALL BUSINESS OWNER NAMED      
20110126031014.000|20110126031016.000|CC1|BRANDON FISHER.                 
20110126031016.000|20110126031019.000|CC1|BRANDON STARTED A COMPANY IN    
20110126031019.000|20110126031020.000|CC1|BERLIN, PENNSYLVANIA, THAT      
20110126031020.000|20110126031023.000|CC1|SPECIALIZES IN A NEW KIND OF    
20110126031023.000|20110126031025.000|CC1|DRILLING TECHNOLOGY.            
20110126031025.000|20110126031027.000|CC1|AND ONE DAY LAST SUMMER HE SAW  
20110126031027.000|20110126031030.000|CC1|THE NEWS THAT HALF WAY ACROSS   
20110126031030.000|20110126031032.000|CC1|THE WORLD 33 MEN WERE TRAPPED IN
20110126031032.000|20110126031034.000|CC1|A CHILEAN MINE.                 
20110126031034.000|20110126031040.000|CC1|AND NO ONE KNEW HOW TO SAVE THEM
20110126031040.000|20110126031041.000|CC1|BUT BRANDON THOUGHT HIS COMPANY 
20110126031041.000|20110126031041.000|CC1|COULD HELP.                     
20110126031041.000|20110126031043.000|CC1|AND SO HE DESIGNED A RESCUE THAT
20110126031043.000|20110126031046.000|CC1|WOULD COME TO BE KNOWN AS PLAN  
20110126031046.000|20110126031047.000|CC1|"B."                            
20110126031047.000|20110126031048.000|CC1|HIS EMPLOYEES WORKED AROUND THE 
20110126031048.000|20110126031049.000|CC1|CLOCK TO MANUFACTURE THE        
20110126031049.000|20110126031052.000|CC1|NECESSARY DRILLING EQUIPMENT.   
20110126031052.000|20110126031055.000|CC1|AND BRANDON LEFT FOR CHILE.     
20110126031055.000|20110126031057.000|CC1|ALONG WITH OTHERS, HE BEGAN     
20110126031057.000|20110126031059.000|CC1|DRILLING A 2,000 FOOT HOLE INTO 
20110126031059.000|20110126031103.000|CC1|THE GROUND, WORKING THREE OR    
20110126031103.000|20110126031106.000|CC1|FOUR DAYS AT A TIME WITHOUT ANY 
20110126031106.000|20110126031107.000|CC1|SLEEP.                          
20110126031107.000|20110126031110.000|CC1|37 DAYS LATER, PLAN "B" SUCCEED 
20110126031110.000|20110126031112.000|CC1|ED AND THE MINERS WERE          
20110126031112.000|20110126031114.000|CC1|RESCUED.                        
20110126031114.000|20110126031124.000|CC1|(APPLAUSE)                      
20110126031124.000|20110126031126.000|CC1|BUT BECAUSE HE DIDN'T WANT ALL  
20110126031126.000|20110126031127.000|CC1|THE ATTENTION, BRANDON WASN'T   
20110126031127.000|20110126031129.000|CC1|THERE WHEN THE MINERS EMERGED.

20110126031825.000|20110126031827.000|CC1|REALISTICALLY, JOHN DICKERSON,  
20110126031827.000|20110126031829.000|CC1|LET ME ASK YOU, HOW LONG WILL   
20110126031829.000|20110126031831.000|CC1|THIS LAST?                      
20110126031831.000|20110126031833.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY WE'VE GOT HEALTH CARE 
20110126031833.000|20110126031835.000|CC1|REFORM LOOMING ON THE HORIZON,  
20110126031835.000|20110126031836.000|CC1|THE REPUBLICANS ARE DOING

20110126032915.000|20110126032917.000|CC1|LAW AS WE PLEDGED TO DO.

20110126032919.000|20110126032921.000|CC1|WITH FISCALLY RESPONSIBLE       
20110126032921.000|20110126032922.000|CC1|PATIENT-CENTERED REFORMS THAT   
20110126032922.000|20110126032925.000|CC1|ACTUALLY REDUCE COSTS AND EXPAND
20110126032925.000|20110126032925.000|CC1|COVERAGE.

20110126032927.000|20110126032929.000|CC1|THE EXPLOSIVE GROWTH OF OUR DEBT
20110126032929.000|20110126032932.000|CC1|AND THE PRESIDENT'S LAW IS

20110126032934.000|20110126032934.000|CC1|BANKRUPTCY.

20110126032936.000|20110126032938.000|CC1|WHAT WAS A FISCAL CHALLENGE IS
